Package monopoly

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • monopoly.Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Covers game logic and turn order.
    Version:
    8/5/2019
    Author:
    Ben Burger, Ian Hall-Watt, Reuben Nyenhuis

    • Field Summary

        Rolls two dice and gets the sum.
        Returns:

      • move

        public int move()
        Moves a player 2d6 spaces on the board.
        Returns:
        number of spaces moved

      • moveTo

        public void moveTo​(int spot)
        This method moves the current player to the given board position.
        Parameters:
        spot - - the desired board position

      • drawChest

        public java.lang.String drawChest()
        Draws a card from the Community Chest deck and performs the necessary actions required by the card.
        Returns:
        String - the message of the card

      • drawChance

        public java.lang.String drawChance()
        Draws a card from the Chance deck and performs the necessary actions required by the card.
        Returns:
        String - the message of the card

      • drawSpecificCard

        public void drawSpecificCard​(char c,
                             int index)
        This method draws the specified card from either the Chance or Community Chest deck and performs the necessary actions required by the card.
        Parameters:
        c - - the card type, 'a' for a Chance card. 'e' (or anything else) for a Chest card
        index - - index of card in its ArrayList

      • useCard

        private void useCard​(Card c)
        Uses the parameters on the given card to enact the correct consequences of the card.
        Parameters:
        c - Card drawn from either Community Chest or Chance deck.

      • buyProperty

        public int buyProperty()
        The current player becomes the owner of the property that he is currently on. That properties price is taken out of the player's money.
        Returns:
        price - the price for the property

      • nextTurn

        public void nextTurn()
        Changes the current player to the next one in order.

      • propertyActions

        public int propertyActions()
        Gets the proper possible action for the space landed on by a player.
        Returns:
        -1: Special property (chance, community chest, free parking, etc.) 0: Unowned property. Prompt to buy. 1: Owned property. Prompt for payment.

      • canGetHouse

        public java.util.ArrayList<Property> canGetHouse()
        This method returns the properties owned by the current player that can have a house added.
        Returns:
        ArrayList - the properties owned by the current player that can have a house added

      • payRent

        public boolean payRent()
        Current player pays rent of landed property.
        Returns:
        True if player goes bankrupt. False otherwise.

      • calculateRent

        public int calculateRent()
        Calculates amount of rent owed, taking into account owning all properties of one color or owning multiple railroads.
        Returns:
        Total rent owed.

      • houseCost

        public int houseCost​(int space)
        Returns the cost of a house at particular space.
        Parameters:
        space - The property space being requested.
        Returns:
        The cost of a house on that space

      • buyHouse

        public boolean buyHouse​(int space)
        Buys a house on the given space. Removes the cost of the house from currentPlayer's money and adds house to the property.
        Parameters:
        space - The property space being requested.
        Returns:
        True if player has the money to buy the property, false otherwise.

      • sellHouse

        public void sellHouse​(int space)
        Sells a house on the given space. Gives currentPlayer appropriate money for the house.
        Parameters:
        space - Which space is to be sold.

      • checkForGameEnd

        public int checkForGameEnd()
        Checks if the game is over.
        Returns:
        playerNum - the winner's player number, or 0 if the game is still going

      • sellProperty

        public boolean sellProperty​(java.lang.String name)
        Takes the given property and removes any owner attached to it. Removes appropriate property count from current player's property Map. Increases current players money by half the properties price (its mortgage value).
        Parameters:
        name - Player input of the property name
        Returns:
        false if property not found. Otherwise true.

      • getDie

        public GVdie getDie​(int num)
        Returns the requested die. Legal values for num are 1 and 2.
        Parameters:
        num - the number of the desired die
        Returns:
        the requested die value

      • createProperties

        private void createProperties()
        Populates board with properties as in Monopoly. Owner being -1 indicates a rent payment that goes to none of the players. Utilities and railroads currently set to a flat rate of $25 for rent.
